line.comment: * Traders can be from a company race. Because of the docking problem, all their homebases are Goners, so we have to bypass that problem.
* Look if someone needs what we have in cargo bay.
* Look at station needs in all reachable sectors.
* First look at factories, then Outposts / Trading stations.
* Haven't found anything to do, go home instead of staying still in space. And wait more.
* Destroy wares that we cannot unload.
* Traders actually don't need for importables and exportables to be sorted. There's no hurry. -- except for homebase.
* Only check if ware is blacklisted for external opportunities.
* Don't go if there's already a Trader on his way, or on his way back.
* Zero Hour Mod, prevents player Traders from WANTING to haul stuff between Docks for free. (they can still do it but then it wasn't planned)
* Only check if ware is blacklisted for external opportunities.

sval.val: is blacklisted
Trying to export %s from cargo hold
Searching for opportunities in %s
Going home
Trying to import %s to %s
Trying to export %s from %s
Task 0.
Traders can be from a company race. Because of the docking problem, all their homebases are Goners, so we have to bypass that problem.
ZH 2.0
Look if someone needs what we have in cargo bay.
Does our Outpost needs this $ware?
Look at homebase needs.
Look at station needs in all reachable sectors.
First look at factories, then Outposts / Trading stations.
$stations = $sector -> get station array from sector
Haven't found anything to do, go home instead of staying still in space. And wait more.
Destroy wares that we cannot unload.
"get true..." ignores equipped wares.
Traders actually don't need for importables and exportables to be sorted. There's no hurry. -- except for homebase.
Only check if ware is blacklisted for external opportunities.
Don't go if there's already a Trader on his way, or on his way back.
Zero Hour Mod, prevents player Traders from WANTING to haul stuff between Docks for free. (they can still do it but then it wasn't planned)
Only check if ware is blacklisted for external opportunities.
